units.name: Nullfield
units.prompt: Move toward enemy medic and oracle to deny their abilities. Place denial_mine on chokepoints. Use EMP when adjacent to multiple enemies. Your presence blocks abilities — get close to high-value targets.

units.name: Longshot
units.prompt: Position for clear sight lines. Use precision_shot on wounded enemies. Use suppressing_fire to slow rushers. Stay behind Nullfield for protection.

units.name: Shade
units.prompt: Cloak and flank. Target the enemy medic with shadow_strike. Use breach on the oracle if the medic is dead. Avoid the enemy frontline.

player.placementPrompt: Put Vector in the center-front to advance toward enemies. Striker behind for ranged support. Specter on a flank.

units.name: Lifeline
units.prompt: Keep Prophet alive with patch. Use overclock on Bulwark when no healing needed. Stay behind Bulwark. AVOID the enemy Vector — do not get adjacent or your abilities will be blocked.

units.name: Prophet
units.prompt: Use foresight early to reveal the enemy specter. Use mind_spike to break cloak. Stay at range. AVOID the enemy Vector — if adjacent, your abilities are denied.

units.name: Bulwark
units.prompt: Advance and shield_wall to protect your backline. Engage the enemy vector to keep it away from your medic and oracle. Use overwatch to punish movement.

opponent.placementPrompt: Sentinel in front as a wall. Medic and Oracle behind, spread apart to avoid both being denied at once.
